page.title: 06Microcomputers
page.content:
In our homes today many of us have a microcoputer.We use computers in many different ways,for playing games, information processing and learning in schools.The computer is now used in all kinds of jobs. Some well known computers are the Commodore, BBC Micro, and the Spectrum. The price of these varies but is up to Â£500. In our class 15 children out of 32 have computers. We have 5 children with a Commodore, 2 with a BBC, 4 with a Spectrum, 1 with an Amstrad, 1 with an Atari and 1 with an Oric. I asked the children in our class which computer game they liked best.11 said Football, 11 said Decathlon, 6 Ghostbusters, 5 Horace, 2 Basketball and 1 Elite.
By Stephen Pick
